languages.text: "Запомни, Мейв: чтобы я тебя не слышал{mf||а} без особого разрешения или прямого вопроса от меня".
"Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."
languages.original_text: "Запомни, Мейв: чтобы я тебя не слышал{mf||а} без особого разрешения или прямого вопроса от меня".

traits.locale_text: "Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."
"Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."
"Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."
"Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."
"Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."
"Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."

languages.text: “记住我的话，梅芙。除非我给你明确的许可，或是我直接问你问题，否则你的话我一个字也不想听。”
languages.original_text: "Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."

traits.locale_text: “记住我的话，梅芙。除非我给你明确的许可，或是我直接问你问题，否则你的话我一个字也不想听。”

languages.text: 「覚えておけ、メイヴ。{mf|俺|私}が明確に許可を与えるか、直接質問したとき以外は、一言たりとも口をきくな」
languages.original_text: "Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."

traits.locale_text: 「覚えておけ、メイヴ。{mf|俺|私}が明確に許可を与えるか、直接質問したとき以外は、一言たりとも口をきくな」

languages.text: «Recuerda, Maive: no quiero oír ni una palabra a menos que te lo permita expresamente o te haga una pregunta directa».
languages.original_text: "Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerda, Maive: no quiero oír ni una palabra a menos que te lo permita expresamente o te haga una pregunta directa».

languages.text: "Unutma Maive. Sana açıkça izin vermedikçe veya doğrudan soru sormadıkça senden tek kelime bile duymak istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."

traits.locale_text: "Unutma Maive. Sana açıkça izin vermedikçe veya doğrudan soru sormadıkça senden tek kelime bile duymak istemiyorum."

languages.text: « Écoutez-moi attentivement, Maive. Je ne veux pas entendre le moindre mot sortir de votre bouche à moins que je ne vous en donne l'autorisation expresse ou que je vous pose une question directe. »
languages.original_text: "Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez-moi attentivement, Maive. Je ne veux pas entendre le moindre mot sortir de votre bouche à moins que je ne vous en donne l'autorisation expresse ou que je vous pose une question directe. »

languages.text: "Denkt daran, Maive: Ich will nichts von Euch hören, sofern ich Euch nicht das Wort erteile oder eine Frage an Euch richte."
languages.original_text: "Remember, Maive: I do not want to hear a word out of you unless I give you explicit permission or ask a direct question."

traits.locale_text: "Denkt daran, Maive: Ich will nichts von Euch hören, sofern ich Euch nicht das Wort erteile oder eine Frage an Euch richte."
